casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Derrick Thomas BAILEY 438P13-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2018 Derrick Bailey, for Bailey, Derrick. Sherri Lawrence, Assistant Attorney General, Seth H. Edwards, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th of July 2018 by Defendant for Notice of Appeal: "Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2018." Ervin, J. recused
